definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ezr 7:26 judgement;—abs. ´[[ד]]: Da 4:34 = justice (of ways of God); emph. [[דִּינׇה מִתְעֲבֵד מִנֵּהּ]] Ezr 7:26 judgment be executed upon him; [[דִּינׇא]] = judges, court Da 7:10, Da 7:26 + perhaps v:Da 7:22 (reading ´[[וְד]]: [[יְהִב]] [[[יְתִב וְשָׁלְטָנׇא]]], Ew Bev Kmp Dr); MT however = judgment was given in favour of (v. Dr).
